title: Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
text: Paris 2024 palette generator

title: Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
code: paris2024_palette(name, n, type = c("discrete", "continuous"), reverse = FALSE)

title: Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
text: name Name colour palette. Options Logo, OlympicRings, GamesLook, Generation2024, Impact2024, TerreDeJeux, Tickets Flame. n Number colours palette. Palettes 2 5 colours can used discrete palette. use , use continuous palette. type Usage palette "continuous" "discrete". Continuous usage interpolates colors create scale values. omitted, function assumes continuous n > length palette, discrete n < length palette. reverse Whether reverse colour palette (TRUE) (FALSE, default).

title: Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
text: vector colours.

title: Paris 2024 palette generator — paris2024_palette
code: paris2024_palette("GamesLook", n = 6, type = "continuous")  paris2024_palette("Logo", 2)  paris2024_palette("OlympicRings")  paris2024_palette("OlympicRings", reverse = TRUE)

text: Use paris2024_palette construct palettes desired length.

what: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024
title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024
text: Function using Paris2024Colours colours schemes ggplot2.

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024
Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024
text: type Usage palette "continuous" "discrete". Continuous usage interpolates colours create scale values. ... arguments passed scale_colour_paris2024_d scale_colour_paris2024_c.

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024
text: function returns colour scale.

what: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
text: Function using Paris2024Colours colours schemes ggplot2. Use scale_colour_paris2024_d scale_fill_paris2024_d discrete scales, use scale_colour_paris2024_c scale_fill_paris2024_c continuous scales.

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
code: scale_colour_paris2024_c(name, reverse = FALSE, ...)  scale_color_paris2024_c(name, reverse = FALSE, ...)

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
text: name Name colour palette. Options Logo, OlympicRings, GamesLook, Generation2024, Impact2024, TerreDeJeux, Tickets Flame. reverse Whether reverse colour palette (TRUE) (FALSE, default). ... arguments passed scale_color_gradientn

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
text: function returns continuous colour scale.

title: Paris 2024 palettes for plotting with ggplot2 — scale_colour_paris2024_c
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(   data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, colour = Sepal.Length) ) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_paris2024_c("GamesLook")

text: name Name colour palette. Options Logo, OlympicRings, GamesLook, Generation2024, Impact2024, TerreDeJeux, Tickets Flame. reverse Whether reverse colour palette (TRUE) (FALSE, default). ... arguments passed discrete_scale

text: function returns discrete colour scale.

code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(   data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, colour = Species) ) +   geom_point() +   scale_colour_paris2024_d("GamesLook")

code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(   data = iris, aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Length, fill = Species) ) +   geom_violin() +   scale_fill_paris2024_d("GamesLook")

title: Paris2024Colours 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-06-20 Modify palette GamesLook Add new palettes: Generation2024, Impact2024, TerreDeJeux, Tickets Flame. Add option reverse colour palette Add colour scales ggplot2 plots Build README Rmarkdown Monitor test coverage Add DOI badge
